name: Panel constructed checked (straight, plumb and square)
All window openings checked and correct
Gib Weatherline – correct fixings used and installed at correct centres

WrapShield – all installation as per manufacturer’s specs; overlaps must be a minimum of 80mm on horizontal and vertical seams, VaproLiqui-Flash applied evenly at least 50mm onto the face and at least 25mm out along all sides of the penetration and all air bubbles must be smooth out to ensure full adhesion.
All panel checks completed and inspections carried out.
Prefab module received and damaged free
Setup completed and clearly marked and ready for installation
Installed in correct centres location with adequate seating (each stud with packers)
Correct centres and fixing used on steel structure and floor
Prefab module installation completed (check location, height and level)
Window opening location checked and correct
Simpson tie bolt checked and tighten
